title: Roast turkey
ingredients: ['One 5.5kg (12 lb) free-range turkey', '120g butter, softened', '1 lemon, cut in half', '1 pinch sea salt', 'For the gravy', 'neck and giblets from turkey', '1 celery stalk, sliced', '1 carrot, roughly chopped', '1 bunch fresh thyme or rosemary', '1 bunch fresh parsley', '60ml red or white wine', 'salt and pepper to season']
